content.rendered:
I finally read Hellboy and i really liked the super expressive way Mignola uses black and white .

Then i started to draw and came up with this random artwork!

excerpt.rendered: I finally read Hellboy and i really liked the super expressive way Mignola uses black and white . Then i started to draw and came up with this random artwork!
